content.body:
> <@nribaudo:igalia.com> I'd like to organize the "mapping" info as a proper struct, I could draft something up and you can take it as an example. Also, feel free to ping me for any editorial question :)

Simon Zünd Example: https://github.com/tc39/source-map/pull/119 :)
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @nribaudo:igalia.com
I'd like to organize the "mapping" info as a proper struct, I could draft something up and you can take it as an example. Also, feel free to ping me for any editorial question :)
Simon Zünd Example: https://github.com/tc39/source-map/pull/119 :)

content.body: Q: Is it valid to have the same URL twice in the `sources` list? Or do they get coalesced?
content.formatted_body: Q: Is it valid to have the same URL twice in the sources list? Or do they get coalesced?

content.body: * Q: Is it valid to have the same URL twice in the `sources` list with different `sourcesContent`? Or do they get coalesced?
content.formatted_body: * Q: Is it valid to have the same URL twice in the sources list with different sourcesContent? Or do they get coalesced?

m.new_content.body: Q: Is it valid to have the same URL twice in the `sources` list with different `sourcesContent`? Or do they get coalesced?
m.new_content.formatted_body: Q: Is it valid to have the same URL twice in the sources list with different sourcesContent? Or do they get coalesced?

content.body: Nic: I opened an issue on this a bit ago that documents the current browser behavior btw https://github.com/tc39/source-map/issues/85
content.formatted_body: Nic: I opened an issue on this a bit ago that documents the current browser behavior btw https://github.com/tc39/source-map/issues/85
